caseTitle: Mian Khalid Rauf v. Ch. Muhammad Saleem and another
tagline: Section 10(1) of Pakistan Criminal Law Amendment Act, 1958, provides that the forum for filing an appeal from the Judgment of a Special Judge is the High Court and the same Court has also been given the powers of revision. Any aggrieved person whether it be the Federal or the Provincial Government or an accused or a complainant could approach the High Court in appeal against either an order of conviction or acquittal or for that matter for the purpose of enhancement of a sentence passed by any Special Judge appointed under the Act of 1958.
